attributes.action: Recognise Narcissistic abuse is psychological abuse & part of domestic violence
attributes.additional_details: This is a premeditated & intentional type of abuse where victims are chosen, groomed and conditioned. The perpetrators have a sheer lack of empathy, compassion, morals & conscience where they take pleasure from hurting, abusing, shaming to name a few and it is very sadistic that they take pleasure from others pain. They install fear into their victims to get them to comply to their demands using threats and gaslighting until the victim feels they are going insane.
attributes.background: For Narcissistic Abuse to be a criminal offence and included in Domestic violence bill.

rejection.details:
The Domestic Abuse Act received Royal Assent in April 2021.  It includes emotional and psychological abuse, which would include narcissistic abuse, as a specific form of domestic abuse:

https://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/2021/17/section/1/enacted
